mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO wifiAPI (mgr_no, borough, wifi_name, address1, address2, in_floor, in_type, in_by, service, network, c_year, in_out, r_connection, lat, lnt, work_date)
VALUES (#{mgr_no}, #{borough}, #{wifi_name}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{in_floor}, #{in_type}, #{in_by}, #{service}, #{network}, #{c_year}, #{in_out}, #{r_connection}, #{lat}, #{lnt}, #{work_date})
mapper.select: SELECT *, ST_Distance_Sphere(point(lnt, lat), point(#{lnt}, #{lat})) AS distance FROM wifiAPI ORDER BY distance LIMIT 20;
